2023-05-18: Given the choice of anyone in the world, whom would you want as a dinner guest?
2023-05-19: Would you like to be famous? In what way?
2023-05-20: What would constitute a “perfect” day for you?
2023-05-21: When did you last sing to yourself? To someone else?
2023-05-22: If you were able to live to the age of 90 and retain either the mind or body of a 30-year-old for the last 60 years of your life, which would you want?
2023-05-23: Do you have a secret hunch about how you will die?
2023-05-24: For what in your life do you feel most grateful?
2023-05-25: If you could change anything about the way you were raised, what would it be?
2023-05-26: In five minutes or less, share your life story in as much detail as possible.
2023-05-27: If you could wake up tomorrow having gained any one quality or ability, what would it be?
2023-05-28: If a crystal ball could tell you the truth about yourself, your life, the future or anything else, what would you want to know?
2023-05-29: Is there something that you’ve dreamed of doing for a long time? Why haven’t you done it?
2023-05-30: What is the greatest accomplishment of your life?
